vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
βρᾰχίων
[Ionic dialect ῐ, Attic dialect ῑ], βράχιστος, comparative and superlative of βραχύς.
vocabInfos.shortDef: arm; a figure of power and authority
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
arm; a figure of power and authority
the arm; the arm, as a symbol of power, Lk. 1:51; Jn. 12:38; Acts 13:17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 膀臂
1a) 神能力的擬人化象徵 (路 1:51; 約 12:38; 徒 13:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 膀臂
1a) 神能力的拟人化象征 (路 1:51; 约 12:38; 徒 13:17)
